title: Help Jannat to beat cancer
body: Jannat Akthar Nishi suffering from Hodgkin's lymphoma, a type of blood cancer, for last 11 years. She requires 1.9 million taka for treatment. Due to financial difficulties her treatment is stopped for a long time. Due to the lack of treatment, Jannat's physical condition is getting worse. According to the doctor's advice, bone marrow transplant needs to be completed as soon as possible. According to the latest statement from the doctor, Jannat still needs approximately 4 million Taka for her treatment, including chemotherapy and bone marrow transplant. A total of 2.1 million Taka has been collected in the treatment fund so far. In this situation, your prayers, love, and supportive attitude Could be the light of hope for Jannat.
